title: U.S. Amazon Prime Day conversion rate 2017 to 2019
summary: This statistic presents the Conversion rate Amazon Prime Day of the Amazon Prime Day Store from 2017 to 2019 .
In the last reported Year , customers spent an estimated 13.5 % rate on in-app purchases , subscriptions and premium appsin the Amazon Prime Day store .
Additional information The Amazon Prime Day was launched in 2008 to coincide with Amazon Prime Day 's iPhone 3G release .
